info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings
info.title: FortiOS Service

get.summary:
Returns list of all packet captures and their status information. 
 Access Group: netgrp.packet-capture

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

schema.title: Packet Captures Status List
schema.description: List of packet capture status information.

mkey.title: Name
mkey.description: The name of the packet capture.

status.title: Packet Capture Status
status.description: The status on the packet capture.

config.title: Configuration
config.description: The packet capture configuration stored in FortiGate config.

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: The Unix timestamp of when the packet capture started.

end_time.title: End Time
end_time.description: The Unix timestamp of when the packet capture ended.

vdom.title: VDOM
vdom.description: The VDOM the packet capture is in.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

mkey.title: Name
mkey.description: Name of the packet capture that was started.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

max_packet_captures.title: Max Packet Captures Per VDOM
max_packet_captures.description: Maximum number of on-going or stored packet captures supported on FortiGate per VDOM.

max_packet_count.title: Max Packet Capture Count
max_packet_count.description: Maximum number of packets in a packet capture.

default_packet_count.title: Default Packet Capture Count
default_packet_count.description: Default number of packets in a packet capture.

has_disk.title: Has Disk
has_disk.description: True if FortiGate has a disk to store packet captures.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request
